Question
========

Bob is interested in the effect of feedback on fathers' comforting of crying babies (two conditions: positive or negative feedback) on fathers' levels of self-confidence (self-report based on 30 questions). In doing so, he intends to statistically control for the number of years of experience of fatherhood (in months).

What analysis technique should Bob use? 
Answerlist
----------
* Simple linear regression analysis
* Multiple logistic regression analysis
* Two-way analysis of variance ('Two-way ANOVA')
* Covariance analysis (ANCOVA)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
